observations.obs_text: Prefers simple G10 hedges. Discussed 3m USDJPY hedging using vanilla options and collars; dislikes complex path dependent payoffs.
Interested in central bank event risk; willing to pay premium for downside protection, but wants clear worst-case outcomes.
Likes directional views around policy divergence and macro data (CPI, NFP). Talks carry and relative value across EM and G10.
Discussed EM LATAM carry basket and opportunistic hedges; open to structures if payoff is intuitive.
Focus on USD rates relative value and curve expression. Interested in steepeners/flatteners and rates options (swaptions).
Needs hedging solutions in G10 FX; prefers simple structures and avoids leverage. Tenor often 1m to 3m.
Interested in yield enhancement but cautious on drawdowns. Likes defined-risk FX vol structures (risk reversals, seagulls).
Fast decision process. Trades carry and volatility signals; will look at systematic FX vol structures and simple directional expressions.

ideas.idea_title: 3m G10 KO Hedge for Central Bank Risk
ideas.idea_text: Idea: 3m KO option structure to hedge G10 FX downside around central bank meetings. Designed for simple worst-case and defined payoff.

ideas.idea_title: EM LATAM Carry Basket with Defined Risk Overlay
ideas.idea_text: Idea: EM LATAM carry basket expression with hedging overlay for drawdown sensitivity. Emphasis on carry with controlled tail risk.

ideas.idea_title: USD Rates Curve Expression via Swaptions
ideas.idea_text: Idea: USD rates curve steepener expressed using rates options (swaptions) to capture convexity with defined premium.

ideas.idea_title: G10 Vanilla Collar for Corporate Hedging
ideas.idea_text: Idea: simple G10 vanilla option collar for hedging FX exposure. Tenor 1m to 3m, avoids leverage and complex path dependence.

ideas.idea_title: FX Vol Structure: Risk Reversal into Event Window
ideas.idea_text: Idea: FX vol structure using risk reversal into a macro data window (CPI / NFP). Expression of volatility view with defined downside premium.
